pages.text: sillo simpan-ui nal-eun geudeul modu leul wihae jeonghayeojin nal-ini
geunal-eun chinguga geuui chingue ge yuyonghaji anihago doumdo bad eul su eobsneun nal-ila
geuleona hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun janeun je-oela sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
sillo jakkumu namuga
joeindeul-ui eumsig-i doeeo
nog-eun soesmulcheoleom doeeo geudeul-ui wi sog-eseo kkeunh-eo oleuni
deulkkeulhneun tteugeoun mulgwa gatdeola
geuttae eumseong-i deullyeooni geuleul delyeoga taoleuneun buljiog-eulo neoh-eula
geuligo geuui meoli wieneun deulkkeulhneun mul-i bueojimyeo
igeos-eul masbola sillo neoyamal lo hullyonghago him-i sen jala
sillo igeos-i nega uisimhaessdeon geos-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun anjeon han gos-e issge doenani
nag-wongwa umuldeul-i issneun gos-ila
seomsehan silkeuwa bidan os-eul geolchigo seoloui eolgul-eul masboge doeli la
geuleohdeus eunhyeleul bepeulgo aleum dabgo nun-i keun baeujileul gyeolhabsikyeo juni
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo ongaj gwail eul pyeonghwalomge jeulgidoda
geudeul-eun hanbeon-ui jug-eum oeeneun dasi jug-eum-eul masboji anihamyeo ha nanim-eun taoleuneun buljiog-ui beollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinila
igeos-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeyo choegoui seunglila
hananim-eun kkulan-eul geudaeui eon eolo gyesihaessgeoneul ilo hayeo geudeul i gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
geuleomeulo geudaeneun gidalimyeo jikyeobola geudeuldo yeogsi gidaligo issnola
